title: calculate memory address from IDA to use with Frida
content:
I saw an interesting value in IDA at address 
0xf8766
; I want to view the value at that address. I debug an Android application with Frida, how can I put this address in Frida to watch this value? I know that I need to use 
Memory.readByteArray(ptr(0xXXXXX), 8)
, but what will be the correct address? Should I read 
/proc/PID/maps
to see the first address and then add this address to the address that I want to see? The first address is 
anon:dalvik-main space (region space)
